description: Occupancy is an application-dependent indication of what is contained by a feature.

properties.name: numberOfOccupants
properties.description: Indicates the number of occupants contained by a feature.

properties.name: interval
properties.description: Indicates the time period the occupants are contained by a feature.

properties.name: occupantType
properties.description: Indicates the specific type of the occupants that are contained by a feature.
